content: @Elliot Silver @Michelle (Moseman) Miller See GF#19362 and my follow up. This relates to other trackers discussing the DR/DR overlap.

@Eric Haas , yes, I think Procedure report is the wrong way.
Yes, I think DR is the way to report on procedures. I guess the issue is that they aren't all diagnostic procedures, but I don't see a better, structured mechanism to report on other types of procedures.
No, I don't think this is materially related to the DR/DR issue.
@Michelle (Moseman) Miller ? Pondering whether the Procedure.report needs more clarification as in used when Procedure is a"Statement of past procedure" vs an event....
